question: what is the fatwa of the qadhaa of qasr namaaz(hanafi)!does 1 perform the ntire namaz?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
If a person missed any Salaat while he was a Musaafir (traveler), he will
have to make Qadhaa (make up) by making Qasr (two Rakaats in Dhuhr, Asr and
Esha) Salaats.

He also has to make Qadhaa of the missed Witr Salaat.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
